subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brad Lidge converted all 48 of his save chances last year, but this season he has 10 blown saves in 38 opportunities, leaving the role of Phillies closer unsettled.
snippet: Brad Lidge converted all 48 of his save chances last year, but this season he has 10 blown saves in 38 opportunities, leaving the role of Phillies closer unsettled.
